extensionDescription.message: Copies files from the browser to Docspell.

notificationSuccess.message: The file has been uploaded to Docspell.
notificationSuccess.description: Tells the user about the success of the upload.

notificationFailure.message: The file could not be uploaded to Docspell. Maybe it's not a PDF file?
notificationFailure.description: Tells the user about the failure of the upload.
